channel.title: RsBuddy
channel.description: Nobody trust RsBuddy ever, got banned twice from wcing -.- and the script look decent, it actually moved the mouse alot and like did realistic stuff. Also, they keylogg.

item.title: RsBuddy
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:26, topic:405855”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=502844.msg3681824#msg3681824 date=1311580697]

Rsbuddy is made by Arbi and the founder of powerbot scammed a looot of rsgp from powerbot users…
Rsbuddy is made by them, bet you one day when they want more money all the free rsbuddy accounts well get hacked or something.

That’s cool. Especially the part where the founder got kicked out years ago (before it was called powerbot). Oh, and the part where Arbiter didn’t do anything. OH, and the part where ins3 (Paris) is a complete dumbass who blamed the hacking on Arbiter because he’s to stupid to fix security holes and admit the real reason everyone got hacked.
[/quote]
Theres proof that Arbi was involved don’t argue with me about it go read up on powerbot on it.
Yes I know the founder left but he was involved lol, him leaving doesn’t have anything to do with his involvement with the scam.
Arbibots was closed right after the Powerbot scam which doesn’t make him seem any less innocent.[/quote]
You’re dumb. The founder (Speljohan) didn’t do anything… And of course powerbot is gonna say Arbiter did it. Paris is a dumbass who blamed Arbiter for all the hacking. The only ‘proof’ has come straight from Paris’ mouth… If you would read around, there’s actually a voice recording of Paris admitting he didn’t do it…

Read full topic

item.title: RsBuddy
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

T4, when the Powerbot users were scammed a fair few bill was xferred from the accounts. Thats thousands and thousands of dollars. Money made from Rsbuddy won’t be thousands and thousands, it’d be in the hundreds currently. I said free users not paid.

You’re so sadly mistaken. As for free users, they view ads.

Read full topic

item.title: RsBuddy
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:21, topic:405855”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=502844.msg3680088#msg3680088 date=1311473663]
Rsbuddy is made by Arbi and the founder of powerbot scammed a looot of rsgp from powerbot users…
Rsbuddy is made by them, bet you one day when they want more money all the free rsbuddy accounts well get hacked or something.
[/quote]
Because the entire world revolves around your gold coins in a virtual game. RSBuddy’s developers wouldn’t be stupid enough to do that. They’d lose thousands of users (ad-money/premium script sales/VIP membership).[/quote]
I never lost anything, my friend did. If I were to loose all my Rsgp to a similar scam to what happened I wouldn’t cry over it cause atm its all botted gp and I only want skills atm.

T4, when the Powerbot users were scammed a fair few bill was xferred from the accounts. Thats thousands and thousands of dollars. Money made from Rsbuddy won’t be thousands and thousands, it’d be in the hundreds currently. I said free users not paid.

Also, they could just start up again. When they got kicked out of Powerbot. Arbibots got shutdown and Rsbuddy was made.

They could easily do that again.

Read full topic

item.title: RsBuddy
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i put my login info in. they say on rsbuddy that its safer than typing it in urself b/c they(anyone that puts a keylogger on ur pc) can keylog the password like that. login info is only stored on the users pc, and are encrypted(the encryption is changed every so often to make it harder to crack). and rsbuddy checks every script they release for malicious code.

Read full topic
